Group (2016-2019):
MATILDA

Introduction

Semmi was a member of the girl group MATILDA. She starred in the Korean drama “The Best Hit” (2017). She was a participant on The Unit.

She announced on Instagram on 6th September 2019 that she had ended her contract with Box Media and would be leaving Matilda.
